test_cases.title: AuthContext provides authentication state
test_cases.description: Verify the AuthContext properly manages authentication state including isAuthenticated, isLoading, and user data
steps: Verify isAuthenticated is false when no token

test_cases.title: AuthContext login flow updates state
test_cases.description: Verify login function stores token and updates isAuthenticated

test_cases.title: AuthContext logout clears state
test_cases.description: Verify logout clears token and resets authentication state

test_cases.title: API client includes auth header
test_cases.description: Verify API requests include Authorization header when token exists

test_cases.title: API client handles errors correctly
test_cases.description: Verify ApiError is thrown with correct status and message on failure
steps: Mock fetch to return error response
Verify ApiError is thrown with correct properties
test_cases.expected_result: ApiError contains status code and message

test_cases.expected_result: Unauthenticated users redirected to auth page
